description: Used for a double-throw relay that can toggle between a thermal store heating up (flow is in the charging direction) or cooling down (flow is in the discharging direction). Events in the StoreFlowDirection finite state machine

value_descriptions.ValvedtoDischargeStore: Thermal store is discharging (and heating the building)
value_descriptions.ValvedtoChargeStore: Thermal store is charging from an external source (like a heat pump or oil boiler).
